definitions.definition: The exterior body of a motor vehicle .
The repair of such a body.
examples: There's a lot of bodywork still left to be done.

definitions.definition: The application of physical therapy as a preventive measure.
A service offered that includes an erotic massage and may also include prostitution.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The exterior body of a motor vehicle .
secondary_definitions: The repair of such a body.
The application of physical therapy as a preventive measure.
A service offered that includes an erotic massage and may also include prostitution.
